AntimatterPulse.help: The Keyes Island reactor is undergoing meltdown, unleashing a deadly barrage of radiation every thirty seconds.

messages.victimHit: The {PowerName} from the reactor irradiates you for {Damage} points of radiation damage!

Annihilation.help: Your interference with Antimatter's control of the reactor has caused a runaway meltdown condition. As the antimatter begins streaming freely from the reactor, it reacts with matter and unleashes a deadly blast of energy that eradicates everything.

messages.victimHit: {PowerName} overwhelms you for {Damage} points of annihilative damage!

messages.victimHit: The {PowerName} from the reactor irradiates you for {Damage} points of annihilation damage!

Entanglement.help: Antimatter's presence has a unique effect on matter, entangling whole entities to cause dangerous interactions with each other.
Entanglement.targetHelp: Antimatter has the ability to entangle macroscopic entities.

messages.victimHit: You are Alpha entangled. Avoid contact with Beta entangled allies!
You are Beta entangled. Avoid contact with Alpha entangled allies!

Devastation_Beam.help: Anti-Matter's space station is equipped with a powerful energy cannon which first ensnares targets with a gravitational attractor, then drives them to the ground while releasing a massive burst of energy.

messages.float: {PlayerDest} is targeted by the Obliteration Beam!
